name: Unzoned
description:
You are on the hunt for lost wreckage
that is said to be the only remaining
evidence of an interstellar war from
the previous century.

Pilot your ship through 5 uncharted
sectors, avoiding Sentry Drones, and
Kinetic Wraiths.

Return 8 wreckage bundles to the
cargo ship to complete your mission.

.........
Controls:
.........

  • Xinput(xbox) controllers:

Left Thumb stick: movement

Dpad: movement

A Button: Shoot/teleport

B Button: boost/Pick Up/Shield

  • Keyboard:

WASD: Movement

M Button: Shoot/teleport

K Button: boost/Pick Up/Shield
